errorDialog.tokenEndpointRequiredMessage:
Logging in with Apple Music is not currently available unless you provide an endpoint that returns an Apple Music developer token in JSON Web Token (JWT) format. 

If you have a token endpoint, you can go to Settings -> Library in Aria, click 'Toggle advanced settings' under 'Apple Music settings', and paste your endpoint into the 'Token Endpoint' field.
errorDialog.tokenFetchErrorMessage: An error occurred while trying to connect to the token server. Please check your internet connection.
errorDialog.musicKitErrorMessage: An error occurred while trying to load MusicKit. This may be due to an invalid developer token. Please check your browser's developer console for any errors.
